elements.name: question9
elements.title: What does Excel do with the empty cell C3?
elements.correctAnswer: Don't pay attention to Excel, because there is nothing in it.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: How do you get to the results even faster on the second table?
elements.correctAnswer: Select cells B9 to E12, open the list arrow at the sigma sign and select "Min", Excel will fill in all yellow cells with the calculation for the minimum.
